title: Schedule a Story for Later Publication
description: A story is finished and edited, but the editor wants to publish it next morning during peak traffic hours.

tasks.description: Upload and format the final version of the article in the CMS.
tasks.expected_outcome: The article is ready for publication.

tasks.description: Instead of clicking 'Publish', use the 'Schedule' function in the CMS.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent navigates to the scheduling tool.

tasks.description: Set the publication date and time for 7 AM the next day.
tasks.expected_outcome: The article is scheduled to go live at the desired time.
